text: William Joseph Bellas (21 May 1925 – 1994) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1994 deaths Category:People from Crosby, Merseyside Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Marine F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:Barry Town United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bill Bellas
